name: game-bug-porter
description: BugPorter HTML5 game, use bugs to deliver bags and get scores.

scripts.cordova:init: cd cordova && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-vibration && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-google-analytics && cd -
scripts.android:key:generator: cd cordova/platforms/android/build/outputs/apk && keytool -genkey -v -keystore android.keystore -alias bug-porter -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 && cp android.keystore ../../../../../../ && cd -
scripts.android:sign:a: cd cordova/platforms/android/build/outputs/apk && jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore android.keystore android-armv7-release-unsigned.apk bug-porter && cd -
scripts.android:sign:x: cd cordova/platforms/android/build/outputs/apk && jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore android.keystore android-x86-release-unsigned.apk bug-porter && cd -
scripts.build: npm run build:www && npm run build:icons && npm run build:android
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:www:prod && npm run build:icons && npm run build:android:prod && npm run android:sign:a && npm run android:sign:x && npm run android:zip:a && npm run android:zip:x
